tweet_text: "इस वीडियो में डॉ. अरविंद राजवंशी प्रोफेसर, एमडी, कार्यकारी निदेशक, एम्स, रायबरेली, आने वाले त्योहारों के दौरान #COVID19 के संक्रमण से बचाव के लिए किन सावधानियों का ध्यान रखना होगा इस विषय में जानकारी दे रहे हैं। https://t.co/5PiZGDdKiX
text_hi: "इस वीडियो में डॉ. अरविंद राजवंशी प्रोफेसर, एमडी, कार्यकारी निदेशक, एम्स, रायबरेली, आने वाले त्योहारों के दौरान के संक्रमण से बचाव के लिए किन सावधानियों का ध्यान रखना होगा इस विषय में जानकारी दे रहे हैं।
"इस वीडियो में डॉ. अरविंद राजवंशी प्रोफेसर, एमडी, कार्यकारी निदेशक, एम्स, रायबरेली, वैक्सीन की दूसरी डोज़ लिए जाने के महत्व के बारे में जानकारी दे रहे हैं।
डॉ. अरविंद राजवंशी, प्रोफेसर, एमडी, कार्यकारी निदेशक, एम्स, रायबरेली, विद्यार्थियों को कक्षाओं के दौरान अनुरूप व्यवहारों का पालन करने का सुझाव दे रहे हैं।

tweet_text: The SHG members have also helped in manufacturing 4.79 lakh litres of sanitizer & about 1.02 Lakh litres of hand wash.  Further, over 5.72 crore persons were served food through Community Kitchens. #AatmanirbharNariShakti
text_en: The SHG members have also helped in manufacturing lakh litres of sanitizer & about Lakh litres of hand wash. Further, over crore persons were served food through Community Kitchens.

tweet_text: Since the beginning of the first wave of COVID-19 itself, about 3 lakh SHG members came together to produce more than 23.7 crore face masks. #AatmanirbharNariShakti
text_en: Since the beginning of the first wave of COVID-19 itself, about lakh SHG members came together to produce more than crore face masks.

tweet_text: So far, 4 lakh Community Resource Persons (CRPs) have been trained as master-trainers. These master-trainers have, in turn, trained 5.6 crores SHG members on COVID appropriate behaviour. #AatmanirbharNariShakti
text_en: So far, lakh Community Resource Persons (CRPs) have been trained as master-trainers. These master-trainers have, in turn, trained crores SHG members on COVID appropriate behaviour.

tweet_text: DAY-NRLM is actively involved in spreading awareness around COVID-19 preventive measures and vaccination among rural households through its SHG networks. #AatmanirbharNariShakti
text_en: DAY-NRLM is actively involved in spreading awareness around COVID-19 preventive measures and vaccination among rural households through its SHG networks.

tweet_text: DAY-NRLM trained more than 4.55 lakh Community Resource persons and 5.52 Crore SHG members to tackle mild covid-19 during the second wave. #AatmanirbharNariShakti
text_en: DAY-NRLM trained more than lakh Community Resource persons and Crore SHG members to tackle mild covid-19 during the second wave.

tweet_text: The set of skills that Manorama acquired from her DDUGKY training gave her the opportunity to serve COVID patients. This work has brought Manorama honour in society and made her a role model for the youth in her village.  #AatmanirbharNariShakti https://t.co/WASBhUesF7
text_en: The set of skills that Manorama acquired from her DDUGKY training gave her the opportunity to serve COVID patients. This work has brought Manorama honour in society and made her a role model for the youth in her village.

tweet_text: The SHGs have contributed immensely to rural India's fight against the COVID-19 pandemic. Over 5.10 crore rural SHG members from 3.24 lakh villages were trained & supported the nation by making masks, soaps & sanitisers and spreading awareness in their community. https://t.co/e6eivLJFbx
text_en: The SHGs have contributed immensely to rural India's fight against the COVID-19 pandemic. Over crore rural SHG members from lakh villages were trained & supported the nation by making masks, soaps & sanitisers and spreading awareness in their community.

tweet_text: Raina is a living example that with hard work & determination one can overcome any challenge, even a physical disability. With the skills learned under DDUGKY, she also participated in India’s fight against COVID19 by making PPE Kits. #AatmanirbharNariShakti https://t.co/NZgUPPZnLe
text_en: Raina is a living example that with hard work & determination one can overcome any challenge, even a physical disability. With the skills learned under DDUGKY, she also participated in Indias fight against COVID19 by making PPE Kits.
